name: Ball on Blocks - Ascension
description:
Just a tiny little game to practice finishing things.

This is a minimalistic platformer with two controls: left and right. Your goals are simply to outrun the falling blocks and not make any wrong turns. The paths are always random, so it's all about focus with nothing to memorize.

- 6 original music tracks, mostly inspired by Classical music favorites with a modern take.
- Two modes: Hero Mode and Zen Mode, each with different pacing and music tracks.
- Each mode takes about 10 to 20 minutes to beat, with an Endless option at the end.
- The Flawless option makes either mode much harder, allowing no mistakes

Currently available to play in browser, or to download as an executable for Windows. Also available for Android as a .APK if you're comfortable with that. (Going to try getting it on the Google Play store.)
